text: The Fallbridge Subdivision is a railway line in southern Washington running about along the Columbia River from Pasco to Vancouver, then south to Portland, OR.Map of BNSF Northern Division It is operated by BNSF Railway and is considered part of the Northern Transcon. Amtrak's Empire Builder 27 and 28 uses this line with stops in Wishram, WA; Bingen, WA; Vancouver, WA; and Portland, OR.Amtrak Empire Builder Route Map == References == ==External links== *BNSF Subdivisions Category:BNSF Railway lines Category:Rail infrastructure in Washington (state)
title: Fallbridge Subdivision
